Text:
Oh my gawd! I'm gonna be the first to leave a comment?????

Where are you all on this unbelieveable, huge, supergroovy, glam-metal, guitar-riffing, grand-daddy of heavy-metal, and rock in general as an influence, seconded only maybe by AC/DC?

If these aren't the most memorable hooks in rock, I don't know what I'm hearing, and show me something better!!

REference Ballroom Blitz!

Herk
Sound quality sucks. It sounds like its coming out of an old tin can
